metadata.title: CVE-2023-52840 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Input: synaptics-rmi4 - fix use after free in rmi_unregister_function()The put_device() calls rmi_release_function() which frees "fn" so thedereference on the next line "fn->num_of_irqs" is a use after free.Move the put_device() to the end to fix this.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
